title: T206 P Clark Griffith portrait HOF SGC - back stamp GB SOLD

posts.post_title: T206 P Clark Griffith portrait HOF SGC - back stamp GB SOLD
posts.post_content:
This T206 Piedmont Clark Griffith portrait has a stunning registration.  It has a backstamp of "G.B.".  SOLD.
